Since announcing she was pregnant in February, Whitney Port has been busy preparing for parenthood with husband Tim Rosenman. And while the mom-to-be can expect plenty of celebrations ahead of her babyâ€™s arrival, a gender reveal party wonâ€™t be one of them.
â€œWeâ€™re not finding out,â€ Port, 32, tells PEOPLE. â€œBut itâ€™s only one of two options, so itâ€™s not that crazy! Youâ€™re kind of prepared either way.â€

â€œItâ€™s made buying anything harder,â€ she says. â€œBut so many brands are gender neutral now, so I think you just buy the necessities and wait until you find out to buy the specific things.â€

Nontraditional seems to be Portâ€™s pregnancy mantra. She told PEOPLE that, â€œItâ€™s so important not to be pressured by what other people are doing or how people are parenting.â€
